TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataProtector extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供数据保护程序的基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for data protectors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类可查看和篡改保护存储的数据。This class protects stored data from viewing and tampering. 对受保护数据的访问是通过创建此类的实例并使用已用于保护数据的确切目的字符串获得的。The access to the protected data is obtained by creating an instance of this class and using the exact purpose strings that were used to protect the data. 调用方不需要密钥来保护或取消保护数据。The caller does not need a key to either protect or unprotect the data. 加密算法提供的密钥。The key is provided by the encryption algorithm. 派生的类必须重写和方法，其中基类回调用。Derived classes must override the and methods, which the base class calls back into. 它们还必须重写方法，它可以始终返回`true`效率应用程序刷新存储的密码文本其数据库时可能小丢失。They must also override the method, which can always return `true` with a potential small loss of efficiency when applications refresh their database of stored cipher text. 派生的类应提供构造函数首先调用基类构造函数，它将设置， ，和属性。Derived classes should provide a constructor that calls the base class constructor, which sets the , , and properties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建保护类的选项用于额外的平均信息量的保护程序的数据。The following example demonstrates how to create a data protector that uses a protection class with an option for extra entropy. 默认情况下，类将添加前对数据进行加密的用途属性的哈希。By default, the class prepends the hash of the purpose properties to the data to be encrypted. 可以关闭该功能，还可以用作额外的平均信息量经过哈希处理的用途时调用的额外的平均信息量选项将数据保护程序。You can turn that functionality off and use the hashed purpose as extra entropy when calling a data protector with an extra entropy option. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.DataProtector#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.dataprotector/cs/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.DataProtector#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.dataprotector/vb/class1.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示使用简单数据保护程序功能类。The following example demonstrates a simple data protector that uses the functionality of the class. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.MemoryProtector#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.memoryprotector/cs/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.MemoryProtector#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.memoryprotector/vb/class1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用提供的应用程序名称、主要用途和具体目的，创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class by using the provided application name, primary purpose, and specific purposes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数设置， ，和属性。This constructor sets the , , and properties. 这三个属性的组合必须唯一地标识要保护的数据。The combination of these three properties must uniquely identify the data you are protecting. 如果不唯一标识数据，你可能会无意中阅读数据错误，或其他数据可能替换为你的帐户。If the data is not uniquely identified, you might inadvertently read the wrong data, or other data might be substituted for yours. 主要和特定用途对示例是"发票"和发票数、"礼品卡"和礼品卡号、"密码"和 URL 字符串。Examples of primary and specific purpose pairs are "invoice" and invoice number, "gift card" and gift card number, "password" and URL string.

summary.span: 创建由构造函数指定的属性值的哈希。

span.span: Creates a hash of the property values specified by the constructor.

returns.span: 包含 、 和 属性的哈希的字节数组。

span.span: An array of bytes that contain the hash of the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 计算应用程序名称和完整目的的哈希。 computes the hash of the application name and the full purpose. 完整的目的是所有的串联和属性。The full purpose is a concatenation of all the and properties. 每三个部分被开头其长度，因此可以反转哈希。Each of the three parts is prefaced with its length so the hash can be reversed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法进行哈希用作额外的平均信息量的目的属性。The following example shows how to use the method to hash the purpose properties for use as extra entropy. 它是为更大的代码示例的一部分类。It is part of a larger code example for the class. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.DataProtector#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.dataprotector/cs/class1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.DataProtector#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.dataprotector/vb/class1.vb#3)]

.property instance bool PrependHashedPurposeToPlaintext

summary.span: 指定哈希是否已附加到加密前的文本数组。

span.span: Specifies whether the hash is prepended to the text array before encryption.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，假定派生的类将预先计算的哈希， ，和加密，并将之前的纯文本的属性检查和验证哈希在解密过程。By default, it is assumed that derived classes will prepend the hash of the , , and properties to the plain text before encryption, and will check and verify the hash during decryption. 如果派生的类想要在其自己上指定的预先计算的数据 （例如作为可选的平均信息量值），此属性可以重写并设置为返回`false`。If a derived class wants to specify the prepended data on its own (for example as an optional entropy value), this property can be overridden and set to return `false`. 如果是`false`，和将直接通过传递给和替代而无需更改的字节数组。If is `false`, and passes directly through to the and overrides without altering the byte array.
